T02D3085:184b-1: a'arya ta th'a ga toshn'i sha si t'a ta pa
T02D3085:184b-2: tre n'a ma aa pa r'a dzi ta dh'a ra
T02D3085:184b-5: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs ba'i gtsug tor nas byung
T02D3085:184b-6: ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma
T02D3085:184b-7: phyir bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs
T02D3085:184b-8: / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3085:184b-9: mthong dang ma mthong la sgrol ba'i ;
T02D3085:184b-10: / gdugs dkar yum la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D3085:184b-11: bdag gzhan don de thob bya'i phyir //
T02D3085:184b-12: lo 'dab tsam cig gsal bar bya //
T02D3085:184b-13: de la 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D3085:184b-14: gnas dben zhing yid dang mthun par dangpo mandal dang mchod pa bshams la khrus bya ste /
T02D3085:184b-15: lus la des byugs nas gos gtsang ma bgos te /
T02D3085:184b-16: stan bde ba la gnas par bya'o //
T02D3085:184b-17: de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i steng du aom dkar po bsams te /
T02D3085:185a-0: de las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang @185a * //
T02D3085:185a-1: 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can dmigs te /
T02D3085:185a-2: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02D3085:185a-3: de nas chad med pa bzhi bsgoms te stong ba nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3085:185a-4: de ltar stong pa nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i aom dkar po bsams te /
T02D3085:185a-5: de nyid las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas 'gro ba'i don byas te /
T02D3085:185a-6: tshur 'dus pa las gdugs dkar po aom gyis mtshan par gyur te /
T02D3085:185a-7: de las 'od zer lha mo'i sku dang bcas pa
T02D3085:185a-8: 'phros pas 'jig rten thams cad du nad dang sdug
T02D3085:185a-9: bsngal thams cad las dgrol te tshur 'dus pas 'phags
T02D3085:185a-10: pa gdugs dkar mo can sku mdog dkar mo rgyan
T02D3085:185a-12: phyag dang po gnyis kyis gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa /
T02D3085:185a-13: sprul pa'i dbu stong phyag stong mnga' ba /
T02D3085:185a-14: spyan bye ba phrag brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo /
T02D3085:185a-15: dbu la mi phyed rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can /
T02D3085:185a-16: sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa /
T02D3085:185a-17: bdag dang gzhan 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa /
T02D3085:185a-18: phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis kun nas yongs su bskor te gnas par bsams te /
T02D3085:185a-19: mchod pa'i tshogs rnams byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3085:185a-20: de nas mdun gyi nam mkhar bhr'um las ye shes
T02D3085:185a-21: kyi gzhal yas khang sems kyi 'byor pa'i rgyan dang
T02D3085:185a-22: ldan par bsgoms pa'i nang du seng ge la sogs
T02D3085:185a-23: pa'i gdan rnams bskyed pa la /
T02D3085:185a-24: spyan drang ba ni snying ga'i aom gyi 'od kyis
T02D3085:185a-25: bskul te dmigs pa rnams mchod yon gyis bzhugs su
T02D3085:185a-26: gsol bar bya'o // de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D3085:185a-27: 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang /
T02D3085:185a-28: sprul pa'i tshogs rnams gsal bar dmigs te /
T02D3085:185a-29: gzhung las byung ba'i phyag rgya dang bstod pa sngon du 'gor bas mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod do //
T02D3085:185a-30: de nas gsol ba btab ste bzlas pa ni bdag
T02D3085:185a-31: dang ye shes kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3085:185a-32: la bzlas ba'i yi ge mu tig gi rdog po
T02D3085:185a-34: spro ba dang bsdu pa'i sbyor bas bzlas pa'i skyon spangs te bzlas ba bya'o //
T02D3085:185a-35: de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
T02D3085:185b-0: cad la phyag 'tshal bar @185b dmigs shing sems can
T02D3085:185b-1: gyi don dran pas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3085:185b-2: de nas ngal lam gtong bar 'dod na bzlas pa
T02D3085:185b-3: yid kyis 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la phul
T02D3085:185b-4: ta / bdag las kyi lha mos 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste /
T02D3085:185b-5: bzod par gsol zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos nas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D3085:185b-6: de nas lus bsrung bar bya ste ldang bar bya'o //
T02D3085:185b-7: langs nas kyang mdo sde zab mo bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3085:185b-8: rtag tu 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo dran par bya'o //
T02D3085:185b-9: phyag 'tshal bar dmigs shing 'byung po'i kha zas spangs te bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D3085:185b-14: bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba dang /
T02D3085:185b-21: 'jigs pa skyob pa kun dang po'i phan yon las 'byung ba ltar thams cad bya'o //
T02D3085:185b-22: bdag 'dra blo dman so so'i skye bo yis //
T02D3085:185b-23: 'phags ma mchog la chu yi thigs tsam bstod //
T02D3085:185b-24: 'di las skyes pa'i bsod nams gang byung bas //
T02D3085:185b-25: bdag dang sems can kun gyis mchog thob shog /'phags
T02D3085:185b-26: pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i
T02D3085:185b-27: gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir
T02D3085:185b-28: bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs slob
